titles.title: A bill to redesignate the Sullys Hill National Game Preserve in the State of North Dakota as the White Horse Hill National Game Preserve.
White Horse Hill National Game Preserve Designation Act
White Horse Hill National Game Preserve Designation Act
White Horse Hill National Game Preserve Designation Act
White Horse Hill National Game Preserve Designation Act
White Horse Hill National Game Preserve Designation Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

calendar.text: Committee on Environment and Public Works. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

action.text: Committee on Environment and Public Works. Reported by Senator Barrasso without amendment. Without written report.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 223.

bill.summary:
White Horse Hill National Game Preserve Designation Act
This bill redesignates the Sullys Hill National Game Preserve in North Dakota as the "White Horse Hill National Game Preserve."
